This bee can be found in the end living in [end stone nests](end-stone-nest) on the outer islands where the chorus grows. It will happily live in a hive when offered the chance.

It gets it's sustenance from Chorus flowers and stems.

Creates [Ender Combs](comb#ender) which processed in a [Centrifuge](centrifuge) will produce ender pearls.

[<< Back to Bees](bees)
